@3peatwillcome
This is an exact copy the Blu ray disc and can be burned onto a BR disc and played on a stand alone player.   On the pc side only Power dvd and maybe Total Media will play folder structure.  Try playing the largerst .mts file in the stream folder (24gigs) this may or may not be the whole movie.  After I have watched all the extras I want I usually convert the main movie to one mkv with only the languages I want that will play in most software.  There are numerous ways and guides on how to do this just search convert blu to mkv.  Hope this helps.

VERY IMPORTANT!!!

I have finished now and even when playing on power dvd there are some repeat scenes and length is slightly different than officail reports.  There is a problem with the original disc this came from.  There are multiple MPL that all are incorrect (checked in EAC 3 GUI and DVD fab) the same scenes repeats out of sequence depending on which MPL is used.  After lots of work I think I have the proper squence for the .mts files.  Processing now and will report back as soon as I have verified.

Just to clarify.  In the MPL that powr dvd uses as default the scene only repeatsonce or twice and at first thought it was a flash back adds only about 1min in length.  The torrent is good just the original disc had problems.  Still a great torrent and you could easily watch and not notice.  But for those that wish to create there own MKV from this file I will post the right seqence for files.

Bozx was kind enough to help me out.  The proper MPLS to use is 76  some how I missed it and power dvd does not choose the right one either.  For those of you doing manually the right squence of .mts files is ....

4,509,504,501,512,511,00001,505,508,503,510,502

How can I fix the repeated scene. I want the spanish audio. Do I convert it to a MKV? How do I do that?

Nevermind, I got it working. 

I used DVDFab 8 to create an MKV, I used Title 76 and chose the Spanish audio, then converted it. Viola!

Full 1920x1080p in Spanish with no repeated scenes.
